document.full_text: nato helicopters from afghanistan intruded into northwest pakistan tuesday, wounding two soldiers, officials said, prompting a protest from the military already seething over the secret u.s. operation to kill osama bin laden.
document.title: pakistan military protests after nato incursion wounds soldiers
lines_and_colors: nato helicopters from afghanistan intruded into northwest pakistan tuesday, wounding two soldiers, officials said, prompting a protest from the military already seething over the secret u.s. operation to kill osama bin laden.
